examples: They'll be offended if you don't go to their wedding.
Se ofenderán si no vas a su boda.
Neil did not mean to offend anybody with his joke.
Neil no quiso ofender a nadie con su broma.
She managed to offend her boyfriend’s parents as soon as she opened her mouth.
Se las arregló para ofender a los padres de su novio tan pronto como abrió la boca.
A TV interviewer must be careful not to offend.
Un entrevistador de televisión debe tener cuidado de no ofender.
